title: Championship riven podium
body: Wouldn't  it be nice if championship riven skin have a podium for herself? In the whole championship series each one has a podium for their selves, except riven. I just feel like championship riven should have one aswell. What do you guys think?

replies.body:
The podium has gotten bigger/more extravagant as the seasons go on.
Zed has a throne even.

It makes sense that Riven doesn't have a podium.
Yes, it does make sense that she doesn't have a podium but it's a shame that one skin is missing out from a feature of the championship series. I mean it wouldn't  hurt to give her a podium.
